SetConnection(ID, Password, IP); IsConnected = resultDataReader.ConnectionTest(); IoH await Showindicator(connectTask); if (!IsConnected) MessageBox. Show("Connection is failed.", "Connection Error", MessageBoxButton.OK, MessageBoxImage.Error); } N (S = Y) { IsConnected = false; MessageBox. Show(ex. Message) ; } finally { IsShowIndicator = false; this.IndicatorContent = "Loading..."; } }
